name: Dinari GME
description: The Dinari dShare token for GameStop stock (GME.d) is a 1:1 backed token representing shares of GameStop Corp. GME.d enables users to gain exposure to GameStop's equity through a tokenized format, harnessing the advantages of blockchain technology. Each GME.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share of GameStop stock, held securely in a transparent treasury vault. This tokenization offers investors enhanced transferability, instant settlement, 24/7 trading, and fractional ownership, increasing the accessibility and liquidity of GameStop stock for a broader range of investors.
